components.Popups.CantonRequired.content:
Dear {therapistSingular}

We need to add canton as part of the details of your practice. Based on zip code you provided, below you can find our suggestions with regards to correct canton.

If we are right, simply choose the correct canton and press 'Save' button. Otherwise, please go to your practice profile, and provide correct canton. Thank a lot!
components.Popups.CantonRequired.title: We need your attention!
components.Popups.LawRegulationsForMulti:
Dear {therapistSingular},

You have activated the function "Multi-User" in your account. Please note the following points:

  • All movements in your account as well as in the accounts of your invited users are now logged with so-called "Audit logs". This way you can always see who made which changes in the account and when. 
  • You will find these "Audit Logs" as follows: please click on the avatar with your initials in the menu to the right of your name > there you will find your "Audit Logs". 
  • From a legal point of view, it is important that you inform your invited users that "Audit logs" are being created. 
  • All "Audit logs" are automatically deleted after 12 months.

Thank you for your attention.

Your HealthAdvisor team
I have read the points above

settings.Calendar.calendarSync.disclaime:
Please be aware that when synchronizing your HealthAdvisor practice calendar with another calendar or device, in cases where you have saved information or data relating to {patientSingular} health, you may be transferring personal data. According to the Data Protection Act (DSG), this would constitute the "processing" of personal data.

Personal data is all information relating to a specific or identifiable person (e.g. the name of your {patientSingular}). Health data about your {patientSingular} falls into a particularly sensitive personal data category (e.g. the reason for treatment or the {patientSingular}'s injury).

Please be further aware that your {patientSingular} data may being transferred to a synchronized calendar provider (e.g. if you are using a cloud solution). Depending on the location of the provider, that data may being also transferred to countries which may not guarantee adequate data protection.

As a {therapistSingular}, we draw your attention to the fact that you must consider different and all risks and obligations. You as the {therapistSingular} are responsible for complying with the DSG framework and for ensuring your {patientSingular} data is appropriately protected. This includes any type of {patientSingular} data that is synchronised with another calendar and the type of synchronised calendar you are using.

With the synchronization you confirm you have been informed by HealthAdvisor Group AG about data protection risks.

settings.EmailWaiver.content:
{patientBigSingular} invoices may contain health data which should be protected under the Data Protection Act. You are required to protect this data from unauthorized access and manipulation with appropriate protective measures.

When sending electronic unencrypted invoices access by unauthorized third parties during the transfer cannot be ruled out. As such you require – ideally written – {patientSingular} consent before sending invoices by e-mail.

Importantly, such a consent is only valid when your {patientPlural} are informed about the data processing situation and all associated risks in advance.

The bottom line is, it is crucial that – before you send invoices to a {patientSingular} by e-mail – you obtain their written consent.

settings.Integrations.swica.enableConfir:
Please note that by synchronizing your appointment availability from the HealthAdvisor platform with the SWICA platform, you will provide the following information to SWICA: name / first name / address / telephone number / e-mail / ZSR number / treatment offerings and related Tarif 590 positions.

By your explicit consent, you give HealthAdvisor Group AG the permission to feed appointments which you defined as available continuously into the SWICA portal and thus make them available for SWICA customers for a possible booking.

Through this process, SWICA will NOT gain access to your {patientSingular} data or other information from your HealthAdvisor account.

By ticking the box, you confirm that you agree with the data transmission to the SWICA portal described here.

If you have any further questions, please feel free to contact us.

If you wish to enable auto resize of the online booking iFrame, follow the instruction:
  1. Add id attribute for online booking iFrame. In this example we assume the id is: HA-online-booking-iframe-reference:{iFrameCode}

settings.InternetBooking.bookingCancella:
If you activate this function, your patients have the option of directly canceling an online booking. This function is only available if you work with online booking via email and client portal.

A link can be integrated into the confirmation e-mail for the online booking, with which the patient can cancel his booking directly.

How does it work?

Under "Settings" > "Output management" > "E-mail templates" > "Accept online booking" you can select a placeholder "Link cancel booking" which you could integrate in your mail text.
Display offers one below the other

settings.InternetBooking.ga.instruction:
OB widget uses two Google Analytic events:{br}
  1. purchase, which is emitted on successful booking. Fields:
    • transaction_id - unique identifier of booking
    • value - price in CHF
    • currency - always "CHF"
    • items - one element array of structure with fields:
    • items[0].item_id - unique identifier of selected treatment
    • items[0].item_name - treatment name
    • items[0].price - price, the same as value
    • items[0].quantity - always "1"
  2. page_view, which is emitted on change step. Fields:
    • page_location - URL of current page, with extra param "step-number", which is step number (number from 0 to 7). Please pay attention that some numbers may be omitted
    • page_title - code of current step. Possible values: therapist, location, group, treatment, date, patient_data_form, verification, thank_you
    Example of payload: {example}

settings.InternetBooking.useWorkingTimeA: Use your entire working time as availability?

Option A

You choose «Use your entire working time as availability?». The system then automatically adopts the times you have set under «Agenda settings» > «My work schedule». No individual time adjustments are possible on a specific day.

This option is suitable for therapists who have very regular working hours.

Option B

If you wish to be very flexible about your availability in online booking, we recommend that you do NOT tick this box. You can then individually define the desired availabilities for each day in the agenda under the «Availability»-button.

This option is suitable for therapists who work irregularly and wish to define flexible working hours.

The report lists the dates, times and durations of treatments rendered by a specific therapist / trainee. The comments displayed on the report are based on the comments saved at the level of the individual meeting.
Evidence of service hours of a trainee rendered under supervision and mentoring of a licensed therapist in order to proof that the required experience has been obtained.
settings.Reporting.report.TREATMENTS: (13) Services report by tariff positions, in CHF
settings.Reporting.report.TREATMENTS.fun: The report shows the value (in CHF) of the services provided in the defined period (selected by meeting dates) for each service/tariff item. This is independent of whether the services have already been invoiced or not. The values are grouped according to the desired period (per day, week, month, quarter, or year). The report can be created in a net (excl. VAT) or gross view.

settings.Reporting.report.TREATMENTS_DUR: (14) Services report by tariff positions, in hours

The report shows the treatment duration (in hours) of the services provided in the defined period (selected by meeting dates) for each service/tariff item. This is independent of whether the services have already been invoiced or not. The aggregated length of time is grouped according to the desired period (per day, week, month, quarter, or year).
Transparency about the duration of the services provided per service/tariff item.

settings.Settings.resources.help: How do I work with resources?
settings.Settings.resources.help.content:
A resource is a special device or a room which I need for a treatment. With the resource planning, I can organize my agenda and online booking even better - especially if my practice includes several therapists or if I work with parallel treatments in several rooms at the same time.

Step 1:
  • Define your resources or resource groups
Step 2:
  • Go to «Settings»> «Agenda» > «Online-booking settings»
  • Please scroll down to «Online treatment offers»
  • Open your treatment offer: at the bottom right you will find a + symbol
  • As soon as you click on the + symbol, the system shows you all resources and you can select the one(s) you need for this treatment offer
  • This way, our system knows that in future it will only be allowed to display this offer if the corresponding resource is still available (especially important if you are working with parallel bookings; in other words: doing parallel treatments in several rooms)
Note:

If you are working with resources, you will now also find them displayed in the agenda (by clicking on the + symbol at the top of the menu).

therapies.QuickMenu.editInstruction:
Sort quick-add positions

Click on the pen on the right to switch to edit mode.

You can use the + symbol to create a folder.

If you click on the arrow on the left of the folder, you can change the color or delete the folder.

To store quick-add items in a folder, click on the folder: a darker area opens below the folder. You can now supply the items you wish in this folder via “drag & drop”.

Click on the x symbol to exit edit mode.

therapies.Therapy.referrerSearch.content:
Please click on the button to find information about the doctor you are looking for. You can combine surname / first name / ZSR number / GLN number / address as search terms.

  • If no match is found, please change the search terms and start the search again.
  • If a match is found, the person's data is displayed and you can import it directly into HealthAdvisor.
  • If multiple matches are found, you can highlight the person you want in the results table and import their data into HealthAdvisor.
